name: book-a-meal
description: Book-A-Meal is an application that allows customers to make food orders and helps the food vendor know what the customers want to eat.
author: Solomon Okwa <solozyokwa@gmail.com>

scripts.build:client: export NODE_ENV=production || set NODE_ENV=production&& webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:server: yarn clean && babel server -d server/dist --ignore spec.js,TestData.js
scripts.db-migrate:test: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.db-migrate:e2e: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env e2e && sequelize db:migrate --env e2e
scripts.db-seed:e2e: export NODE_ENV=e2e || set NODE_ENV=e2e&& sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db-seed:test: export NODE_ENV=test || set NODE_ENV=test&& sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.kill-node: lsof -i tcp:8000 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -2
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=production || set NODE_ENV=production&& node server/bin/www
scripts.start:client:dev: export NODE_ENV=development || set NODE_ENV=development&& webpack-dev-server --mode development --config webpack.dev.js --open
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV=development || set NODE_ENV=development&& yarn db-migrate:dev && nodemon --exec babel-node server/bin/www
scripts.start:e2e: export NODE_ENV=e2e || set NODE_ENV=e2e&& babel-node server/bin/www || exit 0
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test || set NODE_ENV=test&& yarn test:client:ci && yarn db-migrate:test && nyc --require babel-core/register mocha server/test/**.spec.js -t 5000 --exit
scripts.test:server: yarn db-migrate:test && nyc --require babel-core/register mocha server/test/**.spec.js -t 5000 --exit
scripts.test:e2e: yarn e2e-setup && yarn db-migrate:e2e && yarn db-seed:e2e && nightwatch || yarn kill-node
